reviews.review_msg: Works incredibly hard for his students. If you match his effort you will learn more in this course than throughout your studies. Very useful course.

He is a knowledgable teacher & also a good lecturer; however, beyond the classroom setting he is unsupportive, not understanding, unrelatable, highly demanding and sometimes condescending.If you're willing to participate he's willing to teach. However even if you're willing to seek his help for improvement he's not willing to give it to you.

This man is a nightmare to deal with. I had him for 2 courses in a Masters program for IS in SFU and as a Second reader for my Masters Thesis. Not one person in my class got anything higher than a B+ from him. Avoid him at all cost! He is unclear, snobby and not a good educator at all.
